data.question: What is the chemical formula of the new inorganic–organic hybrid solid synthesized?
data.answer: [Zn(dap)2][AlB5O10]

data.question: What structural features does [Zn(dap)2][AlB5O10] combine?
data.answer: It combines the structural features of 3D open-framework inorganic solids and 2D metal–organic coordination polymers.

data.question: Under what conditions was [Zn(dap)2][AlB5O10] synthesized?
data.answer: It was synthesized under solvothermal conditions.

data.question: What potential applications do crystalline open-framework inorganic solids have?
data.answer: They have potential applications in catalysis, separation, and ion exchange.

data.question: What is the role of amines, inorganic cations, and discrete metal complexes in the synthesis of open-framework aluminoborates?
data.answer: They act as structure-directing agents.

data.question: What unique structural feature does β-BaB2O4 (BBO) exhibit?
data.answer: It exhibits excellent second-order nonlinear optical (NLO) properties.

data.question: How does the presence of B5O10 clusters influence the formation of channels in the aluminoborate framework?
data.answer: The presence of B5O10 clusters may favor the formation of odd-ring channels.

data.question: What is the significance of the zinc(II) coordination polymer in the structure of [Zn(dap)2][AlB5O10]?
data.answer: It may play a structure-directing role in the formation of the 3D aluminoborate framework.

data.question: What is the band gap of compound 1 based on its UV/Vis/NIR diffuse reflectance spectrum?
data.answer: The band gap of compound 1 is 5.82 eV.

data.question: What is the maximum temperature at which compound 1 remains stable?
data.answer: Compound 1 remains stable up to about 370°C.

data.question: True or False: The structure of [Zn(dap)2][AlB5O10] contains organic-ligand–metal–inorganic-anion linkages.
data.answer: False

data.question: True or False: The zinc(II) coordination network in [Zn(dap)2][AlB5O10] generates infinite layers parallel to the ac plane.
data.answer: False

data.question: True or False: The inorganic aluminoborate framework in [Zn(dap)2][AlB5O10] has a diamond topology.
data.answer: True

data.question: True or False: The presence of a zinc(II) coordination polymer in the pores of the open-framework aluminoborate is a common structural feature in open-framework compounds.
data.answer: False

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of [Zn(dap)2][AlB5O10] demonstrates a possible supramolecular templating approach to open-framework inorganic solids.
data.answer: True

data.question: True or False: The SHG efficiency of compound 1 is about 1/3 that of KH2PO4 (KDP).
data.answer: True

data.question: True or False: The framework of [Zn(dap)2][AlB5O10] starts to collapse at temperatures above 360°C.
data.answer: True

data.question: What is the role of pyridine in the synthesis of [Zn(dap)2][AlB5O10]?
data.answer: Pyridine is part of the mixed solvent used in the solvothermal synthesis.

data.question: What is the yield of compound 1 based on aluminum?
data.answer: The yield of compound 1 is 80% based on aluminum.

data.question: What is the crystal system and space group of compound 1?
data.answer: Compound 1 crystallizes in the orthorhombic system, space group Pna21.
